gradient live – a live gradient wallpaper. The “gradient live” app offers the following settings:
1. Refresh rate – choose the frame rate, limited by your device’s screen refresh rate. 2. Frame count – set the number of gradient frames (minimum 30), affecting speed and smoothness. 3. Gradient length coefficient – choose the gradient length in screen units (fractional or integer from 1 to 5), influencing speed and sharpness. 4. Movement direction – select the direction of gradient motion. Choosing “center” disables the gradient, showing a single color that changes smoothly according to your settings. 5. Color generation rules – define how the next color is generated. Available variables: r, g, b, h, s, v, random(), random(max), random(min, max); numbers (including fractions); operators ‘+’, ‘-’, ‘*’, ‘/’, ‘%’; and parentheses ‘(’, ‘)’. Any expression containing other characters or that cannot be evaluated initially will not be saved. If it later fails to evaluate, the function will return 0.
Tap to learn how to use the app.
